metadata.about: These annotations are provided by people in the community and are updated on a daily basis by the staff at the UCSC Genome Browser. For more information on how this works, see the settings page for this track at UCSC..

onClick.label:
function(f) {var f = this.feature; var br='
';var name = f.get('Name'); var notes = 'Name: '+name +br; var start = f.get('start');var end = f.get('end');notes=notes+'Position: '+start+'..'+end+br; var extra_field0 = f.get('extra_field0'); notes = notes+'Topic: '+extra_field0+br;var extra_field1 = f.get('extra_field1');notes=notes+'Details: '+extra_field1+br; notes=notes+'Click for more info'; return notes; }
onClick.title: {name}

metadata.about: A collection of annotated spike mutations, curated by Emma B. Hodcroft, Institute of Social and Preventive Medicine, University of Bern, Switzerland and at bigbed file provided by the folks at the UCSC Genome Browser. The color scheme matches that of the UCSC Genome Browser: Blue for oldest variants (Winter/Spring 2020), Purple for Summer, 2020 and red for newest (Fall, 2020 and Winter 2021). For more information on this data, see the settings page for this track at UCSC.

style.borderColor: function(f) {var date = f.get('seq_date');var pieces  = date.split('-'); var year = pieces[0]; var month = pieces[1]; if ((year==20 || year==2020) && month < 6) {return '#1901F5';} if ((year==2020 ||year == 20) && month < 9) {return '#75147C';} return '#EA3323';}
style.color: function(f) {var date = f.get('seq_date');var pieces  = date.split('-'); var year = pieces[0]; var month = pieces[1]; if ((year==20 || year==2020) && month < 6) {return '#1901F5';} if ((year==2020 ||year == 20) && month < 9) {return '#75147C';} return '#EA3323';}

onClick.label:
function(f) {var f = this.feature; var br='
';var name = f.get('Name'); var notes = 'Name: '+name +br; var start = f.get('start');var end = f.get('end');notes=notes+'Position: '+start+'..'+end+br; var clinical = f.get('clinical_notes'); notes = notes+'Clinical notes: '+clinical+br;var geography = f.get('geography_notes');notes=notes+'Geography notes: '+geography_notes+br;var date=f.get('seq_date');notes=notes+'Sequence date: '+seq_date+br; notes=notes+'Click for more info'; return notes; }

onClick.label: Go to the gene page for {name} at GenBank
onClick.url: function(track,f) {var dbxref = f.get('dbxref'); dbxref = dbxref.substring(7);  return 'https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/gene/' + dbxref; }

metadata.about: Reference sequence and gene features are from RefSeq: https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/nuccore/NC_045512.  The color scheme for CDS features attempts to mimic the colors used at NextStrain: https://nextstrain.org/ncov?gmin=27585

onClick.label: Go to the protein page for {name} at GenBank

style.color: function(f) {var name =f.get('name'); var len = f.get('length'); if(len >13000 || name=='YP_009725295.1') {return '#DA994B';} if (name=='YP_009724389.1') {return '#ADBC61';} if (name=='YP_009724390.1' ||name=='YP_009724392.1' ) {return '#D2AE52';} if(name=='YP_009724391.1') {return '#CE5035';} if (name=='YP_009724393.1') {return '#6295B7';} if (name=='YP_009724394.1') {return '#C2B959';} if (name=='YP_009724395.1') {return '#84B586';} if (name=='YP_009724396.1') {return '#72A89E';} if (name=='YP_009724397.2') {return '#D77741';} if (name=='YP_009725255.1') {return '#98BB70';} return 'darkpink'; }

metadata.about: Primers and probes from https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/lab/rt-pcr-panel-primer-probes.html. The CDC makes quite clear that these primers should not be used for diagnostic purposes.

metadata.about: Data in this track are primarily derived from RefSeq GFF for NC_045512.2, with some additions noted in the header for the GFF file, at https://github.com/GMOD/sars-cov-2-jbrowse/blob/master/jbrowse/data/SARS-CoV-2/NC_045512.2.gff3.

style.description: function(f) {var name=f.get('protein_name'); var note = f.get('note');return name ? name + '; ' + note : note;}
style.label: function(f) {var pname=f.get('protein_symbol'); var name = f.get('name'); return pname + ' ('+name+')'; }
